<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales Marketing Manager

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Your Mission:
Sales Strategy: Assist in the development and implementation of innovative sales and marketing strategies to drive revenue growth and client acquisition.Marketing Initiatives: Assist in the creation of compelling brand and sales content across various formats, including web pages, blogs, sales materials, advertisements, and decks.Strategic Input: Collaborate with leadership to develop and execute marketing strategies that deliver tangible results.
Who We're Looking For:
Exceptional Communication: Your ability to communicate effectively builds bridges and fosters lasting relationships with clients and team members.Detail-Oriented: You're highly organized and excel at managing complex projects without losing sight of important details.Strategic Thinker: You understand the client's needs and can provide creative solutions to complex challenges.Enthusiastic: We value enthusiasm and passion for making a difference in the world through our work.
Desired Qualifications:
Proficiency in time management and handling multiple projects simultaneously.Understanding of digital technology and its role in enhancing creative marketing strategies.Ability to think strategically and generate innovative concepts independently.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Positive attitude, strong judgment, and curiosity about all aspects of business.Self-disciplined, self-motivated, and continuously striving for self-improvement.Ability to collaborate effectively both internally and externally with clients.Customer Relationship Management: Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships, understanding their needs and effectively communicating our value proposition.Strategic Selling Skills: Proficiency in identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, with a strategic approach to closing deals and expanding our client base.Sales Collateral Development: Experience in creating persuasive sales materials and presentations to effectively communicate our offerings and differentiate us from competitors.Sales Pipeline Management: Skill in managing and nurturing leads through the sales pipeline, from initial contact to conversion, utilizing CRM tools and strategies.Negotiation Skills: Strong negotiation skills to secure favorable terms and agreements with clients, maximizing value for both parties.Market Insight: Knowledge of market trends, competitor activities, and client preferences to inform sales strategies and tactics.Collaborative Approach: Ability to collaborate effectively with the marketing team to align sales and marketing efforts and maximize impact.
Perks & Benefits:
Competitive Salary: $40,000 to $60,000 annually.Hybrid Work Environment: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely and in-office as needed.Empowering Culture: Join a team where your ideas are valued, and your contributions make a real difference.Continuous Learning: Benefit from ongoing training and development opportunities to support your growth trajectory.
Ready to Join Us? Leap into a career that blends passion with purpose.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
